titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Pell. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered favorably reported an original resolution (S.Res. 381) in lieu of this measure.

bill.summary: 1/26/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, from March 1, 1988, through February 28, 1989, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide training for its professional staff.
